channel.title: Pentagon Hacker Not to be Charged in the UK
channel.description:
http://www.javno.com/en-world/britain-rules-out-charges-against-pentagon-hacker_237953
British prosecutors said on Thursday they would not bring charges against a computer expert accused by a U.S. attorney of the "biggest military hack of all time", dealing a blow to his bid to avoid extradition.
The CPS decision does not spell the end of McKinnon's legal battle. Last month, London's High Court ruled McKinnon, who has been diagnosed with Asperger's Syndrome, could seek a judicial review of the government's decision to extradite him.
It's not his fault. It's the AssBurgers.

item.title: Pentagon Hacker Not to be Charged in the UK
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

I’ve heard some rumors that he wasn’t charged/transfered to the U.S because he has Asperger’s Syndrome. But IMO that can’t be a reason. Its not like he did it by accident.

Read full topic
